SELECT inquiry_seq.NEXTVAL FROM dual
INSERT INTO inquiry (inquiry_id, user_id, title, content, status, created_date, updated_date) VALUES (#{inquiry_id}, #{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, '대기중', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT i.inquiry_id, i.user_id, i.title, i.content, i.status, i.created_date, i.updated_date, u.user_name, r.reply_id, r.reply_content, r.created_date as reply_date FROM inquiry i LEFT JOIN users u ON i.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT inquiry_id, reply_id, reply_content, created_date FROM ( SELECT inquiry_id, reply_id, reply_content, created_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY inquiry_id ORDER BY reply_id DESC) as rn FROM inquiry_reply ) WHERE rn = 1 ) r ON i.inquiry_id = r.inquiry_id WHERE i.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY i.created_date DESC
